Mending Affinity: Regain +6 HP from healer's kit, potion, or spell
Overwhelming Cleave: May use a bonus action after attacking to attack another foe adjacent to target
Persistent Rage: May continue raging when unengaged w/a foe
Polearm Master: Successful bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning/Foe entering polearm reach provokes OA
Rage: +4 Strength damage
Reckless Attack: During rage, may suffer foe Adv on attacks to gain Adv on Strength melee attacks for 1 rd
Sentinel: Successful OA halts target/May take an OA when an adjacent foe uses Disengage/May use Reaction to attack when an adjacent foe targets another
Stance Of The Mountain: Cannot be knocked prone during rage
Thunderous Blows: May push foe 5' w/a successful attack (DC 19 Strength neg)
Unstoppable: Cannot be slowed, frightened, paralyzed, or stunned during rage; suffer 1 level of exhaustion when rage ends

Save Notes:
Danger Sense: Adv on Dexterity vs. visible dangers
Dungeon Delver: Adv on trap avoidance and resistance/Has resistance to trap damage
Rage: Adv on Strength saves and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Relentless Rage: Successful DC 10+ Constitution save retains 1 HP when brought to 0 HP
Magic
Magic Notes: Rage: Cannot cast or concentrate during rage
